CustomField.description: Type of unplanned event plus extra spaces for print format(This field was created for NPL MA).
CustomField.formula: IF( INCLUDES(Type_of_unplanned_Event__c, 'Injury'), 'Injury' & BR(), null) + IF( INCLUDES(Type_of_unplanned_Event__c, 'Quality'), 'Quality' & BR(), null) + IF( INCLUDES(Type_of_unplanned_Event__c, 'Property damage'), 'Property damage' & BR(), null) + IF( INCLUDES(Type_of_unplanned_Event__c, 'Vehicle related'), 'Vehicle related' & BR(), null) + IF( INCLUDES(Type_of_unplanned_Event__c, 'Environmental impact/spill'), 'Environmental impact/spill' & BR(), null) + IF( INCLUDES(Type_of_unplanned_Event__c, 'Other'), 'Other', null)
CustomField.label: Type of unplanned event long
